GetAtt.Description: The URL generated by MediaTailor to initiate a playback session. The session uses server-side reporting. This setting is ignored in PUT operations.
The URL that is used to initiate a playback session for devices that support Apple HLS. The session uses server-side reporting.
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the playback configuration.
The URL that the player accesses to get a manifest from MediaTailor. This session will use server-side reporting.
The URL that the player uses to initialize a session that uses client-side reporting.
